text: hi there. has anyone here used HubSpot as db for a login functionality? if yes, how is the performance? any issues in latency in retrieving/submitting data?
Like more than just these ones?
is it possible to remove them? like setting them to false for a specific category

Yeah you can customize the data inside of this cookie:
```__hs_cookie_cat_pref```
That's the one that contains all the categories
i dont see that cookie unfortunately. We try to integrate the cookie consent through Google Tag Manager, but is there a way to set false to analytics, but true to advertisement?
